profileAlternative.name: Amla Srivastava
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist @ Bloomberg || Columbia University
profileAlternative.summary:
I work with the Data Science Solutions team at Bloomberg to build machine learning tools to help clients across Product, Sales, Marketing, and HR better analyze insights from data. My day-to-day work involves building large-scale recommendation systems, text classification/clustering, and statistical modeling. I hold an MS in Data Science from Columbia University and a Bachelors degree in Computer Science.

During Fall 2017, I interned with the Data Science team at NBC Universal where I worked on clustering and inferential analysis to model demographic variation across TV shows and networks.

I spent the Summer of 2017 at Hartford Insurance building loss models to improve on existing Class Plans for Auto Insurance.

My industry experience also includes a year as an Analyst and a six month internship with McKinsey & Company in India.

Interests: Machine Learning, NLP, Deep Learning, Data Mining, Software Development

Feel free to reach out to me at amla2693@gmail.com!

educations.title: Columbia University in the City of New York

given.text: I supervised Amla on multiple projects for the RAI team at McKinsey. She focused on providing our client with quality research that was targeted and meaningful. She picked up our business with ease and was eager to apply her technical skills to more challenging problems right from the beginning. Amla is a talented individual who doesn’t shy away from hard problems and exhibits confidence and professionalism. I would be more than happy to work with her in the future! See less

I was working with Amla during her time as a Data Science intern with The Hartford. Amla was quick to pick up new concepts and showed an intuitive understanding of business. She completed two significant projects during the summer with excellent results. Her work on loss modeling helped us identify areas for improvement in our existing Class Plan. She also displayed sound understanding of machine learning techniques and great presentation skills. She will be an asset to any organization she works with! See less
